info.title: Laravel JWT Auth API
info.description: API documentation for authentication using JWT in Laravel.

post.summary: Login user and get JWT token

200.description: Itinéraire mis à jour avec succès

post.summary: Attach an itinerary to user's 'to visit' list
post.description: Attaches an itinerary to the authenticated user's 'to visit' list.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the itinerary to attach

get.summary: Get itineraries to visit for authenticated user
get.description: Returns all itineraries marked as 'to visit' by the authenticated user, with related destinations and categories.
Search itineraries by title, with case-insensitive matching using ILIKE.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The search term for itinerary title

get.description: Returns the top 10 itineraries based on the number of favorites (favoris).

get.summary: Get the count of itineraries by category
get.description: Returns the count of itineraries for each category.

200.description: List of categories with itinerary count

get.description: Returns itineraries filtered by category with their destinations.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the category to filter itineraries by

200.description: List of itineraries filtered by category with destinations
